official_title: To require the Government Development Bank for Puerto Rico to make available low-interest loans for the redevelopment of certain areas affected by natural disasters.

summary.text: Hurricane Hugo Disaster Relief Act - Directs the Government Development Bank for Puerto Rico to make low-interest loans for the redevelopment of areas within a U.S. possession or qualified Caribbean Basin country that sustains severe damage as a result of any natural disaster.

titles.title: To require the Government Development Bank for Puerto Rico to make available low-interest loans for the redevelopment of certain areas affected by natural disasters.
